ai-iti87:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti87:2.1_0: “Mendicants, these three unskillful thoughts are destroyers of sight, vision, and knowledge. They block wisdom, they’re on the side of anguish, and they don’t lead to extinguishment.
ai-iti87:2.6_0: These are the three unskillful thoughts that are destroyers of sight, vision, and knowledge. They block wisdom, they’re on the side of anguish, and they don’t lead to extinguishment.
ai-iti87:3.1_0: These three skillful thoughts are creators of sight, vision, and knowledge. They grow wisdom, they’re on the side of solace, and they lead to extinguishment.
ai-iti87:3.6_0: These are the three skillful thoughts that are creators of sight, vision, and knowledge. They grow wisdom, they’re on the side of solace, and they lead to extinguishment.”
ai-iti87:3.7_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti87:4.2_0: and get rid of the unskillful.
ai-iti87:4.5_0: with a heart calmed of thought,
ai-iti87:4.6_0: you’ll touch the state of peace right here.”
ai-iti87:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
